title: Dalhousie team uses 3D printing to build prototype for face shield
description: The mechanical engineering department at Dalhousie University has developed a face shield for health-care workers on the front lines of the COVID-19 pandemic.
content: The mechanical engineering department at Dalhousie University has developed a face shield for health care workers on the front lines of the COVID pandemic Working in conjunction with the Nova Scotia Health Authority and the Nova Scotia College of Art and chars
